title: Flame Strike
content:
erity to halve.

How to Acquire Flame Strike

Flame Strike can be acquired by the following classes: Cleric The Fiend (Warlock) Flame Strike can be cast by using the following Items: ???

Cleric The Fiend (Warlock)

Flame Strike Tips & Notes

Upcast: Deals an additional 1d6 damage and 1d6 damage for each Spell Slot Level above 5th.

Lvl 5 Spells Banishing Smite ♦ Cloudkill ♦ Cone of Cold ♦ Conjure Elemental ♦ Contagion ♦ Curriculum of Strategy: Artistry of War ♦ Danse Macabre ♦ Destructive Wave
